mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.classid AS "classid", a.file_name AS "fileName", a.file_path AS "filePath", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.desc_info AS "descInfo", a.doc_type AS "docType", a.version_no AS "versionNo", a.modify_reason AS "modifyReason", a.modify_content AS "modifyContent", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zsk_document( id, classid, file_name, file_path, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, desc_info, doc_type, version_no, modify_reason, modify_content, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{classid}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{descInfo}, #{docType}, #{versionNo}, #{modifyReason}, #{modifyContent}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zsk_document SET file_name = #{fileName}, file_path = #{filePath}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, desc_info = #{descInfo}, doc_type = #{docType}, version_no = #{versionNo}, modify_reason = #{modifyReason}, modify_content = #{modifyContent}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
